sentences.en: At Qian Hu, we proactively seek opportunities to participate in initiatives to promote philanthropy, business and entrepreneurship in our community.
sentences.cn: 在仟湖鱼业，我们积极寻求机会来参与各种活动措施，在社会中推广慈善事业、商业和企业家精神。

sentences.en: But perhaps nowhere are the roadblocks to youthful enterprise so evident, and the consequences to the Japanese economy so dire, as in the failure of entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 但或许年轻人的进取心到处碰壁，这在日本社会已司空见惯。 而缺乏企业家精神，这对日本经济造成了可怕的恶果。

sentences.en: Do people really want to incorporate entrepreneurship into their daily life?
sentences.cn: 人们真的要纳入企业纳入其日常的生活?

sentences.en: Entrepreneurship at all levels is also more about intuition than industry.
sentences.cn: 各个层面上的企业家精神,更大程度上是与直觉、而非勤勉有关.

sentences.en: Four is strengthening of entrepreneurship and job training routine.
sentences.cn: 四是加强创业和日常就业培训.

sentences.en: He provides evidence that n - achievement is highly correlated with entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 他提供的材料表明“n -- 成就”与企业家精神高度相关.

sentences.en: However, entrepreneurship is clearly growing on them, as more than a quarter of graduates (26 per cent) reported starting their own company during their EMBA or since graduating.
sentences.cn: 然而，学员身上的创业精神明显在增强，超过四分之一的毕业生（26%）称在就读EMBA期间或毕业后创办了自己的公司。

sentences.en: Most definitions of entrepreneurship include this notion of innovation.
sentences.cn: 大多数企业家的定义包括这一概念的创新.

sentences.en: Presently , entrepreneurship, innovation and excellence - creating are the sublimation of the spirit.
sentences.cn: 在新的历史条件下, “创业创新创优”的三创精神是新时期江苏人文精神的升华.

sentences.en: Schools and universities around the world are teaching entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 世界各地的中小学校和高等院校都在教授创业的学科.

sentences.en: Such entrepreneurship be promoted, and credit be considered a human right.
sentences.cn: 这样的创业应加以促进, 而贷款应被看作为一种人权.

sentences.en: The education is based on the ideas of market - based economics and entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 培训内容基于市场经济学和企业家的经验.

sentences.en: The fifth myth is that entrepreneurship cannot flourish in bigcompanies.
sentences.cn: 第五个误解是创业精神在大公司里不会繁荣.

sentences.en: The logical link between the two is East Asian entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 二之间的逻辑链接是东亚企业精神.

sentences.en: The third myth is that entrepreneurship is driven mainly by venture capital.
sentences.cn: 第三个误区则为,自主创业主要靠的就是创业投资.

sentences.en: The triumph of entrepreneurship is driven by profound technologicalchange.
sentences.cn: 创业精神的成功来自深刻的技术革新.

sentences.en: They, like other necessity entrepreneurs, may have resorted to entrepreneurship due to a lack of better options.
sentences.cn: 他们像其他生存型企业家一样，因为没有更好的选择才会诉诸于创业。

sentences.en: Wellhope remains a model of entrepreneurship, honesty, integrity and sound business management.
sentences.cn: 禾丰牧业以诚实 、 直的经营理念, 完善的现代商业管理机制成为了中国饲料企业的楷模.

sentences.en: Yet the threat to entrepreneurship, both practical and ideological, can be exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 然而对创业精神的威胁, 不论是现实上的还是意识形态上的, 都可能被夸大.

trans.tran_cn: 企业家能力/职能，企业家[主办人等]的身份[地位、职权、能力]，企业家精神，创业
trans.tran_en: Entrepreneurship is the state of being an entrepreneur, or the activities associated with being an entrepreneur
